operations.summary: Get contents of the target Shopper's Cart

parameters.name: X-Shopper-Id
parameters.description: Shopper ID whose Cart should be retrieved, if it differs from authenticated

parameters.name: X-Private-Label-Id
parameters.description: PrivateLabelId to operate as, if different from JWT

parameters.name: X-Market-Id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Market in which the request is happening

parameters.name: X-Currency-Id
parameters.description: Currency in which pricing information should be accepted and/or returned

parameters.name: includes
parameters.description: Optional properties to be included in the response. Including errors performs Product-specific extended validation, such as TLD-based Contact, Eligibility, and Presence requirements

responseMessages.message: Authentication info not sent or invalid
Authenticated user is not allowed access
Too many requests received within interval

operations.summary: Clears contents of the target Shopper's Cart

parameters.name: X-Shopper-Id
parameters.description: Shopper ID whose Cart should be modified, if it differs from authenticated

parameters.name: X-Private-Label-Id
parameters.description: PrivateLabelId to operate as, if different from JWT

responseMessages.message: Authentication info not sent or invalid
Authenticated user is not allowed access
Too many requests received within interval

operations.summary: Applies the specified additions/changes to the target Shopper's Cart

parameters.name: X-Shopper-Id
parameters.description: Shopper ID whose Cart should be modified, if it differs from authenticated

parameters.name: X-Private-Label-Id
parameters.description: PrivateLabelId to operate as, if different from JWT

parameters.name: X-Market-Id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Market in which the request is happening

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The modifications to make to the target Shopper's Cart

responseMessages.message: Authentication info not sent or invalid
Authenticated user is not allowed access
Too many requests received within interval

operations.summary: Removes the specified CartItem from the target Shopper's Cart

parameters.name: X-Shopper-Id
parameters.description: Shopper ID whose Cart should be modified, if it differs from authenticated

parameters.name: X-Private-Label-Id
parameters.description: PrivateLabelId to operate as, if different from JWT

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: CartItem ID to be deleted

responseMessages.message: Authentication info not sent or invalid
Authenticated user is not allowed access
Too many requests received within interval

operations.summary: Removes multiple specified CartItems from the target Shopper's Cart

parameters.name: X-Shopper-Id
parameters.description: Shopper ID whose Cart should be modified, if it differs from authenticated

parameters.name: X-Private-Label-Id
parameters.description: PrivateLabelId to operate as, if different from JWT

parameters.name: itemIds
parameters.description: IDs of CartItems to be deleted

responseMessages.message: Authentication info not sent or invalid
Authenticated user is not allowed access
Too many requests received within interval

operations.summary: Removes the specified CartGroup from the target Shopper's Cart

parameters.name: groupKey
parameters.description: CartGroup key to be deleted

parameters.name: X-Private-Label-Id
parameters.description: PrivateLabelId to operate as, if different from JWT

responseMessages.message: Authentication info not sent or invalid
Authenticated user is not allowed access
Too many requests received within interval

operations.summary: Replace the target Shopper's Cart with source Shopper's Cart

parameters.name: encryptedSourceShopperId
parameters.description: Encrypted source Shopper ID

parameters.name: X-Shopper-Id
parameters.description: Shopper ID whose Cart should be replaced by source Shopper's Cart,if it differs from authenticated

responseMessages.message: Authentication info not sent or invalid
Authenticated user is not allowed access
Too many requests received within interval

operations.summary: Retrieves the schema which must be completed in order to purchase the specified product

parameters.name: pfid
parameters.description: Product ID whose schema should be retrieved

parameters.name: X-Private-Label-Id
parameters.description: PrivateLabelId to operate as, if different from JWT

operations.summary: Expands listings and adds prices the supplied virtual cart

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A virtual cart to expand and price

parameters.name: X-Shopper-Id
parameters.description: Shopper ID who owns this virtual cart, if it differs from authenticated

parameters.name: X-Private-Label-Id
parameters.description: PrivateLabelId to operate as, if different from JWT

parameters.name: X-Market-Id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Market in which the request is happening

parameters.name: X-Currency-Id
parameters.description: Currency in which pricing information should be accepted and/or returned

responseMessages.message: Authentication info not sent or invalid
Authenticated user is not allowed access
Based on invalid cart structure or data
Too many requests received within interval

operations.summary: Performs product specific validation on the item metadata in the target Shopper's Cart
operations.notes: Product-specific extended validation includes checks such as TLD-based Contact, Eligibility, and Presence requirements

parameters.name: X-Shopper-Id
parameters.description: Shopper ID whose Cart should be retrieved, if it differs from authenticated

parameters.name: X-Market-Id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Market in which the request is happening

parameters.name: X-Private-Label-Id
parameters.description: PrivateLabelId to operate as, if different from JWT

responseMessages.message: Authentication info not sent or invalid
Authenticated user is not allowed access
Based on invalid cart structure or data
Too many requests received within interval

currency.description: Currency in which pricing information is returned

agreementKeys.description: Unique identifiers of the legal agreements to which the end-user must consent, as returned from the /v1/agreements endpoint

groups.description: Sets of two or more products purchased together

contacts.description: Contact information for Domains in the cart

itemSourceCode.description: (ISC) A code used to track the origin or source of a customer. The presence of this code may apply a discount or indicate an affiliate referral.

pricing.description: Pricing for products in the cart - returned only when `includes=pricing`

itemSourceCodeDetail.description: Indicates the details of the code specified in `itemSourceCode`.

blockedPaymentMethods.description: Payment methods that should be blocked for this cart (for example: when incompatible with a discount code). Values for this field must be passed to the 'restrictedMethod' parameter of the `GET /methods` Payment API

billTo.description: The billing contact information that will be used at the time that this cart is purchased.

itemId.description: The unique identifier for this item so that it may be specifically updated or deleted

pfid.description: The id representing which product will be purchased by this item

productTypeId.description: The id of the type of product that will be purchased by this item

label.description: Human readable description that is only visible when overridden

subscriptionId.description: Unique identifier of an existing Subscription that will be upgraded or renewed by this item

trial.description:
Whether the period between the purchase transaction and the `billOn` date is a trial period or a prorated renewal to synchronize the billing date
NOTE: This feature is only supported in the virtual cart at this time

quantityUnitLabelKey.description: Key to retrieve localized quantity unit label

period.description: The amount of time that this item will be purchased for which typically determines the expiration date of the subscription after purchase

periodUnit.description: The unit of time that `period` is measured in

billOn.description: Used to sync renewal billing to a specific datetime, rather than periodically from the date of purchase

displayOrder.description: The order in which to display this item when reassembling a single list of items and groups

discountedItemIds.description: ItemIds of discounted cart items. Removal of this item will cause price changes to the items referenced here

metadata.description: Additional product specific information that must be specified to describe what will be purchased. Must match the JSON schema returned by `GET ./cart/products/{pfid}/schema`

clientIp.description: IP Address of the end-user device used to add this item

itemTrackingCode.description: Unique identifier of the presentation page where this request originated

affiliate.description: Affiliate information in effect when the item was added

firstTouch.description: Date when a customer was referred by an affiliate

code.description: The coupon code to redeem for this item

type.description: Indicates the type of coupon code to prevent collision from codes generated by multiple partners

subtotal.description: Price with any discounts and without taxes or fees for given `quantity` and `period`

savings.description:
Savings off of list price for given `quantity` and `period` 
`savings` = `list` - `subtotal`

discount.description:
Discount off of sale price for given `quantity` and `period` 
`discount` = `sale` - `subtotal`

unit.description: Pricing for a single unit of the given item

renewal.description:
Pricing for the renewal of the given item
Note: This will currently only be returned for free trial items
TODO: Revise this note after completing in-app purchase

icann.description: ICANN Fees for any domain registrations

list.description: List price without consideration of `quantity` and `period`

subtotal.description: Price with any discounts and without taxes or fees without consideration of `quantity` and `period`

savings.description:
Savings off of list price without consideration of `quantity` and `period` 
`savings` = `list` - `subtotal`

sale.description: Sale price without consideration of `quantity` and `period`

discount.description:
Discount off of sale price without consideration of `quantity` and `period` 
`discount` = `sale` - `subtotal`

ranges.description: Discounted price for each discounted period or quantity on a multi-period or quantity item. Omitted when `periodCount` or `quantity` is equal to 1

periodMin.description: Starting period of the discounted price (inclusive)

periodMax.description: Ending period of the discounted price (inclusive). Optional when `subtotal` can be applied to remaining periods

subtotal.description: Discounted price without taxes or fees

total.description:
Price the customer will pay at the time of renewal 
`total` = `subtotal` + `taxes` + `fees.total`

subtotal.description: Price with any discounts and without taxes or fees for given `quantity` and `period`

savings.description:
Savings off of list price for given `quantity` and `period` 
`savings` = `list` - `subtotal`

discount.description:
Discount off of sale price for given `quantity` and `period` 
`discount` = `sale` - `subtotal`

hash.description: A hash of this item used to verify that restricted properties have not been modified

content.description: Additional information that is included in the signature hash

groupKey.description: The primary key identifying a group

displayOrder.description: The order in which to display this item when reassembling a single list of items and groups

subtotal.description: Sum of subtotal prices for all items in the group

list.description: Sum of list prices for all items in the group

savings.description: Sum of savings for all items in the group

sale.description: Sum of sale prices for all items in the group

discount.description: Sum of discounts for all items in the group

fees.description: Sum of fees for all items in the group

itemId.description: The unique identifier for this item so that it may be specifically updated or deleted

pfid.description: The id representing which product will be purchased by this item

productTypeId.description: The id of the type of product that will be purchased by this item

label.description: Human readable description that is only visible when overridden

canRemoveAlone.description: Indicates whether an item can be removed without cascading to the whole group

subscriptionId.description: Unique identifier of an existing Subscription that will be upgraded or renewed by this item

quantityUnitLabelKey.description: Key to retrieve localized quantity unit label

period.description: The amount of time that this item will be purchased for which typically determines the expiration date of the subscription after purchase

periodUnit.description: The unit of time that `period` is measured in

billOn.description: Used to sync renewal billing to a specific date, rather than periodically from the date of purchase

displayOrder.description: The order in which to display this item when reassembling a single list of items and groups

metadata.description: Additional product specific information that must be specified to describe what will be purchased. Must match the JSON schema returned by `GET ./cart/products/{pfid}/schema`

contactKey.description: The key used to reference this contact in the domain metadata

country.description:
Two-letter ISO country code to be used as a hint for target region

NOTE: These are sample values, there are many more

subtotal.description: Price with `discount` and without taxes or fees

list.description: Sum of list prices for the entire cart

status.description: Indicates the state of the promotion code specified in `itemSourceCode`.

spendMin.description: Minimum spend amount required to apply the promotional savings

spendDelta.description: Additional spend amount required to apply the promotional savings

savings.description: Possible savings when `spendMinimum` is met for fixed amount promotions

savingsPercent.description: Possible savings percentage when `spendMinimum` is met for percentage promotions

taxId.description: Value Added Tax ID used for calculating the tax the customer is required to pay

code.description: Short identifier for the error, suitable for indicating the specific error within client code

message.description: Human-readable, English description of the error

fields.description: List of the specific fields, and the errors found with their contents

path.description:
• JSONPath referring to a field containing an error
    • OR
  • JSONPath referring to a field that refers to an object containing an error, with more detail in `pathRelated`

pathRelated.description: JSONPath referring to a field containing an error, which is referenced by `path`

code.description: Short identifier for the error, suitable for indicating the specific error within client code

message.description: Human-readable, English description of the problem with the contents of the field

retryAfterSec.description: Number of seconds to wait before attempting a similar request

code.description: Short identifier for the error, suitable for indicating the specific error within client code

message.description: Human-readable, English description of the error

fields.description: List of the specific fields, and the errors found with their contents

listings.description: The set of listing ids to add to the cart. The listing will be expanded into one or more items in the cart

items.description: Cart items to add or update

groups.description: Cart items to add or update

itemSourceCode.description: (ISC) A code used to track the origin or source of a customer. The presence of this code may apply a discount or indicate an affiliate referral.

billTo.description: The billing contact information that will be used at the time that this cart is purchased.

listingId.description: Must be specified to add a new listing

periodCount.description: The number of natural product periods that will be purchased by this item. Each pfid has its own natural period, for example: A 2-year domain pfid's natural period is 2 years.

billOn.description: Used to sync renewal billing to a specific date, rather than periodically from the date of purchase

metadata.description: Additional product specific information that must be specified to describe what will be purchased. Must match the JSON schema returned by `GET ./cart/products/{pfid}/schema`

itemId.description: Must be specified to update an existing CartItem

pfid.description: Must be specified to add a new CartItem

subscriptionId.description: Unique identifier of an existing Subscription that will be upgraded or renewed by this item

periodCount.description: The number of natural product periods that will be purchased by this item. Each pfid has its own natural period, for example: A 2-year domain pfid's natural period is 2 years.

billOn.description: Used to sync renewal billing to a specific date, rather than periodically from the date of purchase

metadata.description: Additional product specific information that must be specified to describe what will be purchased. Must match the JSON schema returned by `GET ./cart/products/{pfid}/schema`

groupKey.description: The primary key identifying a group

taxId.description: VAT Tax ID used for calculating the tax the customer is required to pay
